Uses of Package
org.tribuo.regression.rtree.impurity

  • Packages that use org.tribuo.regression.rtree.impurity 
    Package Description
    org.tribuo.regression.rtree
    Provides an implementation of decision trees for regression problems.
    org.tribuo.regression.rtree.impl
    Provides internal implementation classes for the regression trees.
    org.tribuo.regression.rtree.impurity
    Provides implementations of regression tree impurity metrics.
  • Classes in org.tribuo.regression.rtree.impurity used by org.tribuo.regression.rtree 
    Class and Description
    RegressorImpurity
    Calculates a tree impurity score based on the regression targets.
  • Classes in org.tribuo.regression.rtree.impurity used by org.tribuo.regression.rtree.impl 
    Class and Description
    RegressorImpurity
    Calculates a tree impurity score based on the regression targets.
  • Classes in org.tribuo.regression.rtree.impurity used by org.tribuo.regression.rtree.impurity 
    Class and Description
    RegressorImpurity
    Calculates a tree impurity score based on the regression targets.
    RegressorImpurity.ImpurityTuple
    Tuple class for the impurity and summed weight.
